contentfulCollection.seoDescription: Our mission is simple: travel the world’s factories finding the nicest things, for the lowest prices. Join our mailing list if you want to hear when we find them.

products.title: Midi Hoop Earrings
products.seoDescription:
A must have staple - as cool as they are comfortable. 

Handcrafted from gold vermeil, sterling silver layered with a thick layer of 18k gold, these are much higher quality than standard gold plating
Ethically produced in Thailand
Hoop Diameter: 16 mm

products.title: Baby Alpaca-Wool Turtleneck
products.seoDescription: Available at a radically low price, this alpaca turtleneck is made to be loved. Soft and luxurious, the flecked yarn and plush feel make it ideal for harsher weather. It's long lasting and resistant to pilling.
